description: Looking for a twist on coleslaw? Try our crunchy slaw which pairs beetroot, apple, parsnip and carrot with creamy Persian feta, fresh dates and pepitas.
name: Matchstick Beet Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup reserved oil from Persian marinated feta

recipeInstructions.text: Cut beetroot into 1.5mm-thick slices. Stack slices together and thinly slice into long, thin matchsticks. Rinse beetroot under cold water and drain well. Cut the carrot, parsnip and apple into matchsticks the same way.
To make the dressing, place all the ingredients in a small bowl, season well and whisk with a fork.
In a large serving bowl, toss beetroot with half the dressing. Add carrot, parsnip, apple, parsley, mint, dates and half the feta. Gently toss to combine.
Crumble and scatter over remaining feta and pepitas. Drizzle over remaining dressing and serve.
